summary: The diff summary does not contain any evidence of changes to frontend/src/main.tsx. Both REQ-2 and REQ-3 explicitly require modifications to main.tsx to add/verify the AuthProvider wrapper, but the diff shows only changes to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json. No implementation of the requested authentication provider wrapper fix is present in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure AuthProvider from frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx properly wraps the App component in frontend/src/main.tsx
